[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Weddings” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”Contact Us” button_one_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOCJ9fQ==@” button_two_text=”Get A Quote” button_two_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOCJ9fQ==@” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.61)” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_one_url,button_two_url” _module_preset=”default” content_font_size=”20px” background_enable_color=”off” background_enable_image=”off” parallax=”on” background_blend=”overlay” global_colors_info=”{}”]With our warm and attentive support, we collaborate closely with brides to bring their visions to life, paying meticulous attention to every detail. From intimate touches to grand designs, we have the expertise to create a magical, unique, and unforgettable day filled with cherished memories. Whether you need just a few pieces or full venue decoration, no task is too small or challenging for us. Let us alleviate the stress by handling the setup, leaving you with a masterpiece to celebrate your love story.[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1549px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][lwp_image_carousel gallery_ids=”396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,404,405,406,407,388,387,386″ slides_show=”4″ show_dots=”off” show_arrows=”off” autoplay_animation=”on” pause_on_hover=”off” infinite_animation=”on” vertical_layout=”off” adaptive_height=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/lwp_image_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”10px||20px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”FREE CONSULTATIONS” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Schedule a free consultation with us to discuss your wedding decor. During the session, you can try out our sample items and plan your tables. Together, we’ll bring your ideas to life. Booking with us saves time and ensures a clear plan for your big day.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”ON THE DAY CO-ORDINATION” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||400″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our team ensures the smooth flow of events, handling all responsibilities to guarantee everything happens seamlessly and on time. This allows the bride and her family to fully relax and enjoy the wedding day without worries.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”TABLE DÉCOR/Center piece” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Discover our extensive range of table decor options, allowing us to curate flawless table displays featuring captivating centrepieces customized to your preferences and style. Whether your taste leans towards traditional, contemporary, or themed designs, we are adept at transforming your vision into reality.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”FLORAL DISPLAYS” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||400″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Flowers add vibrant color, drama, and style to your dream event, enhancing its character. Simplify your wedding planning by ordering your flowers and bouquets through us. Save on costly florist charges while ensuring your floral arrangements perfectly match your colors and theme. Let us handle the creation and delivery of all your flower needs for a professional and convenient experience.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”BRIDAL BOUQUETS” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We specialize in delivering the bride’s vision for her bridal bouquet. Coordinating with the wedding decor, we ensure that the bridal bouquet, bridesmaid’s bouquets, and boutonnieres complement the overall theme. Our extensive library of floral images and ideas aids brides in selecting their bouquet style, and we provide guidance on seasonal flower availability and suitable alternatives when needed. 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”DRAPING” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Transform any venue into a magical space with our soft flowing fabric draping. Whether it’s from ceiling to floor, bridal table backdrops, or ceiling festoons, we bring elegance to every corner. Choose from serene white or dramatic black to suit your style. Add fairy lights, bunting, or Chinese lanterns for an extra special touch and create a festive atmosphere that enchants guests from the moment they arrive.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Candles and lighting” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Candles offer an enchanting ambiance to any event, and at Party Décor Hire, we provide a cost-effective solution to elevate your atmosphere.

Crafted in-house from recycled materials, our candles not only contribute to the magical ambiance but also offer an economical choice compared to traditional options.

Choose from our selection of pillar candles, available in various heights and two widths: 7.5cm and 11cm. We also offer floating candles to add a unique touch to your decor.

Enhance the ambiance further with our exquisite tea-light votives and candlesticks, essential for creating a captivating atmosphere at your celebration.

Additionally, we offer fairy lights in lengths of 4 meters, 10 meters, and 20 meters.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Photo Booth” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Make your wedding day unforgettable with our retro photo booth experience. Our retro and 360 photo booths capture every moment, from silly poses to heartfelt embraces, providing lasting memories for you and your guests. With customizable options, instant printing, and digital sharing, the joy of your day is shared far and wide. Let our professional team take care of every detail, ensuring a seamless and fun-filled experience. Contact us today to book your date and elevate your celebration with our photo booth!

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
